item.title: High-level synthesis of a belief propagation accelerator
item.description: Using Vivado-HLS to rapidly prototype and test accelerators

item.title: Delay-aware proportional-fair scheduling in OFDMA networks
Multi-touch interface for visualising network information
item.description: I worked on this project as a summer intern at École de technologie supérieure, Montréal, Canada, under the guidance of Dr. Michael McGuffin. My work involved developing new and innovative gestures for network layout manipulation. Over the course of almost 10 weeks, I converted an existing interface from a mouse-keyboard interaction technique to a touch based technique, with special gestures like radial menus, toolglass widgets and popup menus to enable easy and intuitive interaction with networks.

item.title: Active noise-cancelling headphones

item.description: Artificial neural networks to identify users from speech

item.title: Text-dependent speaker verification
item.description: Matching spoken text to identify users on an Atmel AVR microcontroller
